rows.label: qev095304_MSG0030
rows.name: Eep! Please, human, help us![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095304_MSG0001
rows.name: Thank you, human. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095304_MSG0002
rows.name:
You are a good deal stronger than the higher-ups in
the Ganglion who fancy themselves great warriors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095304_MSG0003
rows.name: *fsssh* Perhaps this human might offer us asylum?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095304_MSG0004
rows.name: It is certainly a possibility worth exploring.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095304_MSG0005
rows.name: We have a request, human, if you will hear it. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095304_MSG0006
rows.name:
We Zaruboggan were not made for combat. *fsssh*
As a result, we have been treated as the lowest of the
low within the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095304_MSG0007
rows.name:
But our suits allow us to survive in any environment.
*fsssh* ...You see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095304_MSG0008
rows.name:
Since arriving on this planet, we've been forced to
survey one hostile location after the next.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095304_MSG0009
rows.name:
Caverns crawling with vicious indigens, sheer cliffsides
where a single misstep means certain death... *fsssh*
Many of our number have already been lost.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095304_MSG0010
rows.name: We are sick and tired of serving the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095304_MSG0011
rows.name:
Is there any way we might be granted asylum within
your city? *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095304_JNK0010
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev095304_SEL0011
rows.name: Welcome the Zaruboggan into New LA.

rows.label: qev095304_JNK0020
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: qev095304_SEL0021
rows.name: Leave the Zaruboggan to their fates.

rows.label: qev095304_MSG0012
rows.name: Oooo![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095304_MSG0013
rows.name: Praise be to Golbogga's mercy! *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095304_MSG0014
rows.name:
We are a sizable group numbering in the teens,
but if you would have us, we would relocate to your
city immediately. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095304_MSG0015
rows.name: Thank you, kind human![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095304_MSG0016
rows.name: I see. *fsssh* A shame.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095304_MSG0017
rows.name: But perseverance is a Zaruboggan virtue.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095304_MSG0018
rows.name:
We will wait here for you to change your mind. *fsssh*
For centuries, if need be.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095304_MSG0019
rows.name:
Not that we have another home to go to...
*fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095304_MSG0020
rows.name: We are sick and tired of serving the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095304_MSG0021
rows.name:
Is there any way we might be granted asylum within
your city? *fsssh*[ST:wait ]
